name: 3-D Maze (Impact Software)
overview: 3-D Maze is a simple maze game played from a first person perspective. Similar to other maze game of its time the player uses keyboard controls to moves around the maze one step at a time. The objective of the game is to find three pieces of treasure which are automatically collected when stepped over. Once that has been accomplished the player has to head back to the entrance to finish the game. A timer on the screen shows how long the game has been played.
